Name: Order of the Five Pillars
Details: Originally created in 2420 to regulate the ivory trade in the Draconis Combine, the Order of the Five Pillars eventually grew to become an unofficial intelligence agency and a competitor to the existing Internal Security Force. The Order is led by the Keeper of the House Honor and is responsible for maintaining the Dictum Honorium, the set of rules and philosophies that rule all aspects of the Draconis Combine society.
